main event: A witness observed a cigar-shaped, silver-gray object with a flashing light disappear suddenly in Winston-Salem, NC on February 20, 1958.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 15 seconds., The object was described as being cigar-shaped., It emitted a candle-like flashing light., The object was reported to disappear suddenly., No photographs were taken of the sighting.
witness description: Mr. & Mrs. ______, clerk at Reynolds Tobacco Co.
